title: Neon_Nights
genre: K-Pop, City Pop, Melodic Rap, R&B, Groovy, Upbeat Melancholy

structure.text: (Groovy Bass & Synth Intro) Yeah, let's go.

Walking down the street light's low
Nobody knows where we gonna go
Feeling the vibe, feeling the flow
Just you and me, taking it slow

Heartbeat racing, can't deny
Lighting up the midnight sky

Party people in the place to be
Dance with me, set your spirit free
5, 4, 3, 2, 1, let's fly
Hai yorokonde, touch the sky

Smooth like butter, cool like ice
Every moment feels so nice
No worries now, just roll the dice
Living our best life, that's the price
